name: hail2u.net
description: The source files of Hail2u (https://hail2u.net/) website
author: Kyo Nagashima <hail2u@gmail.com> (https://hail2u.net/)

scripts.prebook: git switch main && rm --force --recursive tmp/ && mkdir tmp
scripts.deploy: cd dist/ && git add --all && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit --message Build && git push origin gh-pages
scripts.test: stylelint src/css/ && eslint bin/ lib/ src/js/
scripts.posttest: git add --all && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit --message Format
scripts.preversion: git switch upnext && npm test && npm audit && git rebase main && git switch main && git merge --ff-only upnext && rm --force --recursive tmp/ && mkdir tmp
scripts.version: cp --recursive --update src/css/. dist/css/ && node bin/css.js && rm dist/css/test.html && cp --recursive --update src/js/. dist/js/ && node bin/js.js && rm dist/js/.eslintrc.json && cp --recursive --update src/img/. dist/img/ && cp --update --no-target-directory src/img/icon.svg dist/favicon.svg && node bin/img.js && node bin/html.js --articles && node bin/html.js && node bin/feed.js
scripts.postversion: git push origin main --tags && git switch - && git rebase main
